/circle6 Find out what the people know about maternal morbidity and mortality in their area. 
Ask them to share this information with you and discuss how deaths and morbidity can 
be prevented.
/circle6 Discuss the role of families and communities in preventing these illnesses and deaths. 
/circle6 Share key messages on maternal and child health with community members and dispel 
their misconceptions.
